outputs.output_descr: The roll-out of IBSA's pilot initiative aims at installing solar energy equipment in the 20 additional IBSA partner villages in Guinea Bissau. It will incorporate the lessons and experiences of the initial 5 villages.  The project will also focus on strengthening the capacity of local associations of each village in order to help them gain a stronger sense of ownership over solar energy activities.

project_descr: Rural Sectrification through Solar Energy Systems: a Roll-out of the Solar Energy Pilot Initiative Conducted by India, Brazil and South Africa (IBSA) in 5 villages.
